title: Solar-energy conversion and light emission in an atomic monolayer p–n diode
title_cn: 原子单层pn二极管中的太阳能转换和发光
abstract: The limitations of the bulk semiconductors currently used in electronic devices—rigidity, heavy weight and high costs—have recently shifted the research efforts to two-dimensional atomic crystals such as graphene and atomically thin transition-metal dichalcogenides. These materials have the potential to be produced at low cost and in large areas, while maintaining high material quality. These properties, as well as their flexibility, make two-dimensional atomic crystals attractive for applications such as solar cells or display panels. The basic building blocks of optoelectronic devices are p–n junction diodes, but they have not yet been demonstrated in a two-dimensional material. Here, we report a p–n junction diode based on an electrostatically doped tungsten diselenide (WSe2) monolayer. We present applications as a photovoltaic solar cell, a photodiode and a light-emitting diode, and obtain light–power conversion and electroluminescence efficiencies of ∼0.5% and ∼0.1%, respectively. Given recent advances in the large-scale production of two-dimensional crystals, we expect them to profoundly impact future developments in solar, lighting and display technologies.
abstract_cn: 电子设备中刚使用的体半导体的局限性是：刚度大，重量重，成本高。近来，研究工作已转移到二维原子晶体上，例如石墨烯和原子上薄的过渡金属二卤化物。这些材料有可能以低成本和大面积生产，同时保持较高的材料质量。这些特性及其灵活性使二维原子晶体对太阳能电池或显示面板等应用具有吸引力。光电器件的基本构件是p＆＃8211; n结二极管，但尚未在二维材料中得到证明。在这里，我们报告了基于静电掺杂的二硒化钨（WSe 2 ）单层的p＆＃8211; n结二极管。我们提出了作为光伏太阳能电池，光电二极管和发光二极管的应用，并且分别获得的光功率转换和电致发光效率分别为＆＃8764; 0.5％和＆＃8764; 0.1％。鉴于二维晶体大规模生产的最新进展，我们希望它们会深刻影响太阳能，照明和显示技术的未来发展。

title: Optoelectronic devices based on electrically tunable p–n diodes in a monolayer dichalcogenide
title_cn: 基于单层二卤化钨中的电可调pn二极管的光电器件
abstract: The p–n junction is the functional element of many electronic and optoelectronic devices, including diodes, bipolar transistors, photodetectors, light-emitting diodes and solar cells. In conventional p–n junctions, the adjacent p- and n-type regions of a semiconductor are formed by chemical doping. Ambipolar semiconductors, such as carbon nanotubes, nanowires and organic molecules, allow for p–n junctions to be configured and modified by electrostatic gating. This electrical control enables a single device to have multiple functionalities. Here, we report ambipolar monolayer WSe2 devices in which two local gates are used to define a p–n junction within the WSe2 sheet. With these electrically tunable p–n junctions, we demonstrate both p–n and n–p diodes with ideality factors better than 2. Under optical excitation, the diodes demonstrate a photodetection responsivity of 210 mA W–1 and photovoltaic power generation with a peak external quantum efficiency of 0.2%, promising values for a nearly transparent monolayer material in a lateral device geometry. Finally, we demonstrate a light-emitting diode based on monolayer WSe2. These devices provide a building block for ultrathin, flexible and nearly transparent optoelectronic and electronic applications based on ambipolar dichalcogenide materials.
abstract_cn: p＆＃8211; n结是许多电子和光电设备的功能元件，包括二极管，双极晶体管，光电探测器，发光二极管和太阳能电池。在常规的p＆＃8211n结中，通过化学掺杂形成半导体的相邻p-型和n-型区域。双极性半导体（例如碳纳米管，纳米线和有机分子）允许通过静电门控配置和修饰p＆＃8211;结。这种电气控制使单个设备具有多种功能。在这里，我们报告了双极性单层WSe 2 器件，其中两个局部栅极用于定义WSe 2 薄片内的p＆＃8211; n结。通过这些电可调的p＆＃8211; n结，我们展示了理想因子优于2的p＆＃8211; n和n＆＃8211; p二极管。在光激发下，这些二极管表现出210＆＃160; mA＆＃的光检测响应度160; W ＆＃8211; 1 和光生伏打发电，其峰值外部量子效率为0.2％，这对于横向器件几何结构中的近乎透明的单层材料来说是很有希望的值。最后，我们演示了基于单层WSe 2 的发光二极管。这些器件为基于双极性二卤化钴材料的超薄，柔性和近乎透明的光电应用提供了构建模块。

title: Electrically tunable excitonic light-emitting diodes based on monolayer WSe2 p–n junctions
title_cn: 基于单层WSe2 p–n结的电可调谐激子发光二极管
abstract: The development of light-emitting diodes with improved efficiency, spectral properties, compactness and integrability is important for lighting, display, optical interconnect, logic and sensor applications. Monolayer transition-metal dichalcogenides have recently emerged as interesting candidates for optoelectronic applications due to their unique optical properties. Electroluminescence has already been observed from monolayer MoS2 devices. However, the electroluminescence efficiency was low and the linewidth broad due both to the poor optical quality of the MoS2 and to ineffective contacts. Here, we report electroluminescence from lateral p–n junctions in monolayer WSe2 induced electrostatically using a thin boron nitride support as a dielectric layer with multiple metal gates beneath. This structure allows effective injection of electrons and holes, and, combined with the high optical quality of WSe2, yields bright electroluminescence with 1,000 times smaller injection current and 10 times smaller linewidth than in MoS2 (refs). Furthermore, by increasing the injection bias we can tune the electroluminescence between regimes of impurity-bound, charged and neutral excitons. This system has the required ingredients for new types of optoelectronic device, such as spin- and valley-polarized light-emitting diodes, on-chip lasers and two-dimensional electro-optic modulators.
abstract_cn: 开发具有更高效率，光谱特性，紧凑性和可集成性的发光二极管对于照明，显示器，光学互连，逻辑和传感器应用至关重要。单层过渡金属二卤化物因其独特的光学性能，最近成为光电应用的有趣候选物。在单层MoS 2 器件中已经观察到电致发光。然而，由于MoS 2 的较差的光学质量和无效的接触，电致发光效率较低，线宽较宽。在这里，我们报告了单层WSe 2 的横向p＆＃8211; n结的电致发光，该结使用薄的氮化硼载体作为电介质层，在其下方具有多个金属栅极，通过静电诱导。这种结构允许有效注入电子和空穴，并结合WSe 2 的高光学质量，产生明亮的电致发光，注入电流比MoS 2小1,000倍，线宽小10倍。 （参考）。此外，通过增加注入偏压，我们可以在杂质结合的，带电的和中性的激子体系之间调节电致发光。该系统具有新型光电子器件所需的成分，例如自旋和谷极偏振发光二极管，片上激光器和二维电光调制器。

title: Graphene photodetectors with ultra-broadband and high responsivity at room temperature
title_cn: 室温下具有超宽带和高响应度的石墨烯光电探测器
abstract: The ability to detect light over a broad spectral range is central to several technological applications in imaging, sensing, spectroscopy and communication. Graphene is a promising candidate material for ultra-broadband photodetectors, as its absorption spectrum covers the entire ultraviolet to far-infrared range. However, the responsivity of graphene-based photodetectors has so far been limited to tens of mA W−1 (refs ) due to the small optical absorption of a monolayer of carbon atoms. Integration of colloidal quantum dots in the light absorption layer can improve the responsivity of graphene photodetectors to ∼1 × 107 A W−1 (ref. ), but the spectral range of photodetection is reduced because light absorption occurs in the quantum dots. Here, we report an ultra-broadband photodetector design based on a graphene double-layer heterostructure. The detector is a phototransistor consisting of a pair of stacked graphene monolayers (top layer, gate; bottom layer, channel) separated by a thin tunnel barrier. Under optical illumination, photoexcited hot carriers generated in the top layer tunnel into the bottom layer, leading to a charge build-up on the gate and a strong photogating effect on the channel conductance. The devices demonstrated room-temperature photodetection from the visible to the mid-infrared range, with mid-infrared responsivity higher than 1 A W−1, as required by most applications. These results address key challenges for broadband infrared detectors, and are promising for the development of graphene-based hot-carrier optoelectronic applications.
abstract_cn: 在广泛的光谱范围内检测光的能力对于成像，传感，光谱学和通信中的多种技术应用至关重要。石墨烯是超宽带光电探测器的有希望的候选材料，因为它的吸收光谱涵盖了整个紫外到远红外范围。但是，由于单分子层的光吸收小，到目前为止，基于石墨烯的光电探测器的响应度仅限于数十mA＆＃160; W ＆＃8722; 1 （refs＆＃160;）。碳原子。胶体量子点在光吸收层中的集成可以提高石墨烯光电探测器对＆＃8764; 1＆＃215;的响应度。 10 7 ＆＃160; A＆＃160; W ＆＃8722; 1 （ref。＆＃160;），但是光检测的光谱范围由于光吸收而减小发生在量子点中。在这里，我们报告基于石墨烯双层异质结构的超宽带光电探测器设计。该检测器是一个光电晶体管，由一对薄的隧道势垒隔开的堆叠的石墨烯单层（顶层，栅极，底层，沟道）组成。在光学照明下，在顶层产生的受光热载流子隧穿进入底层，从而导致电荷在栅极上积聚，并对沟道电导产生强烈的光门效应。这些设备显示了从可见光到中红外范围的室温光检测，大多数人都要求中红外响应度高于1＆＃160; W ＆＃8722; 1 应用程序。这些结果解决了宽带红外探测器所面临的主要挑战，并为基于石墨烯的热载流子光电应用的开发带来了希望。

title: Subnanometre resolution in three-dimensional magnetic resonance imaging of individual dark spins
title_cn: 单个暗自旋的三维磁共振成像中的亚纳米分辨率
abstract: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) has revolutionized biomedical science by providing non-invasive, three-dimensional biological imaging. However, spatial resolution in conventional MRI systems is limited to tens of micrometres, which is insufficient for imaging on molecular scales. Here, we demonstrate an MRI technique that provides subnanometre spatial resolution in three dimensions, with single electron-spin sensitivity. Our imaging method works under ambient conditions and can measure ubiquitous ‘dark’ spins, which constitute nearly all spin targets of interest. In this technique, the magnetic quantum-projection noise of dark spins is measured using a single nitrogen-vacancy (NV) magnetometer located near the surface of a diamond chip. The distribution of spins surrounding the NV magnetometer is imaged with a scanning magnetic-field gradient. To evaluate the performance of the NV-MRI technique, we image the three-dimensional landscape of electronic spins at the diamond surface and achieve an unprecedented combination of resolution (0.8 nm laterally and 1.5 nm vertically) and single-spin sensitivity. Our measurements uncover electronic spins on the diamond surface that can potentially be used as resources for improved magnetic imaging. This NV-MRI technique is immediately applicable to diverse systems including imaging spin chains, readout of spin-based quantum bits, and determining the location of spin labels in biological systems.
abstract_cn: 磁共振成像（MRI）通过提供非侵入性的三维生物成像，彻底改变了生物医学科学。然而，常规MRI系统中的空间分辨率限于几十微米，这不足以在分子尺度上成像。在这里，我们演示了一种MRI技术，该技术可在三个维度上提供亚纳米级的空间分辨率，并具有单电子自旋灵敏度。我们的成像方法可以在环境条件下工作，并且可以测量无处不在的“暗”。自旋，几乎构成所有感兴趣的自旋目标。在此技术中，使用位于金刚石芯片表面附近的单个氮空位（NV）磁力计测量暗自旋的磁性量子投影噪声。 NV磁力计周围的自旋分布通过扫描磁场梯度成像。为了评估NV-MRI技术的性能，我们在钻石表面成像了电子自旋的三维景观，并实现了前所未有的分辨率组合（横向为0.8＆＃160 nm，垂直为1.5＆＃160nm），并且单旋灵敏度。我们的测量结果揭示了金刚石表面上的电子自旋，可以潜在地用作改善磁成像的资源。这种NV-MRI技术可立即应用于多种系统，包括成像自旋链，读取基于自旋的量子位并确定自旋标记在生物系统中的位置。

title: Random nanolasing in the Anderson localized regime
title_cn: 安德森局部化方案中的随机纳米激光
abstract: The development of nanoscale optical devices for classical and quantum photonics is affected by unavoidable fabrication imperfections that often impose performance limitations. However, disorder may also enable new functionalities, for example in random lasers, where lasing relies on random multiple scattering. The applicability of random lasers has been limited due to multidirectional emission, lack of tunability, and strong mode competition with chaotic fluctuations due to a weak mode confinement. The regime of Anderson localization of light has been proposed for obtaining stable multimode random lasing, and initial work concerned macroscopic one-dimensional layered media. Here, we demonstrate on-chip random nanolasers where the cavity feedback is provided by the intrinsic disorder. The strong confinement achieved by Anderson localization reduces the spatial overlap between lasing modes, thus preventing mode competition and improving stability. This enables highly efficient, stable and broadband wavelength-controlled lasers with very small mode volumes. Furthermore, the complex interplay between gain, dispersion-controlled slow light, and disorder is demonstrated experimentally for a non-conservative random medium. The statistical analysis shows a way towards optimizing random-lasing performance by reducing the localization length, a universal parameter.
abstract_cn: 用于经典和量子光子学的纳米级光学器件的发展受到不可避免的制造缺陷的影响，这些缺陷通常会造成性能限制。但是，无序也可能启用新功能，例如在随机激光器中，激光依赖于随机多重散射。由于多方向发射，缺乏可调谐性以及由于弱模式限制而导致的具有混沌波动的强模式竞争，随机激光器的适用性受到了限制。为了获得稳定的多模随机激光，已经提出了安德森光的局域化方案，并且最初的工作涉及宏观的一维分层介质。在这里，我们演示了片上随机纳米激光，其中空腔反馈是由内在无序提供的。通过安德森定位实现的强约束限制了激光模式之间的空间重叠，从而防止了模式竞争并提高了稳定性。这使得模式体积很小的高效，稳定和宽带波长控制激光器成为可能。此外，对于非保守随机介质，实验证明了增益，色散控制的慢光和无序之间的复杂相互作用。统计分析显示了一种通过减小本地化长度（通用参数）来优化随机激光性能的方法。

title: Third-harmonic-upconversion enhancement from a single semiconductor nanoparticle coupled to a plasmonic antenna
title_cn: 从单个半导体纳米粒子耦合到等离激元天线的三次谐波上转换增强
abstract: The ability to convert low-energy quanta into a quantum of higher energy is of great interest for a variety of applications, including bioimaging, drug delivery and photovoltaics. Although high conversion efficiencies can be achieved using macroscopic nonlinear crystals, upconverting light at the nanometre scale remains challenging because the subwavelength scale of materials prevents the exploitation of phase-matching processes. Light–plasmon interactions that occur in nanostructured noble metals have offered alternative opportunities for nonlinear upconversion of infrared light, but conversion efficiency rates remain extremely low due to the weak penetration of the exciting fields into the metal. Here, we show that third-harmonic generation from an individual semiconductor indium tin oxide nanoparticle is significantly enhanced when coupled within a plasmonic gold dimer. The plasmonic dimer acts as a receiving optical antenna, confining the incident far-field radiation into a near field localized at its gap; the indium tin oxide nanoparticle located at the plasmonic dimer gap acts as a localized nonlinear transmitter upconverting three incident photons at frequency ω into a photon at frequency 3ω. This hybrid nanodevice provides third-harmonic-generation enhancements of up to 106-fold compared with an isolated indium tin oxide nanoparticle, with an effective third-order susceptibility up to 3.5 × 103 nm V−2 and conversion efficiency of 0.0007%. We also show that the upconverted third-harmonic emission can be exploited to probe the near-field intensity at the plasmonic dimer gap.
abstract_cn: 将低能量子转换成高能量子的能力对于包括生物成像，药物输送和光伏技术在内的各种应用都引起了极大的兴趣。尽管使用宏观非线性晶体可以实现高转换效率，但是由于材料的亚波长尺度会阻止相位匹配过程的利用，因此在纳米尺度上对光进行上转换仍然具有挑战性。纳米结构贵金属中发生的光等离子体相互作用为红外光的非线性上转换提供了替代机会，但是由于激发场对金属的弱穿透，转换效率仍然非常低。在这里，我们显示了当耦合到等离激元金二聚体中时，单个半导体铟锡氧化物纳米粒子的三次谐波产生显着增强。等离子体二聚体用作接收光天线，将入射的远场辐射限制在位于其间隙处的近场中。位于等离子二聚体间隙的氧化铟锡纳米粒子充当局部非线性发射器，对频率为＆＃969的三个入射光子进行上变频。进入频率为3＆＃969;的光子。与分离的铟锡氧化物纳米粒子相比，这种混合纳米器件可提供高达10 6 倍的三次谐波产生增强，有效的三次磁化率可达3.5＆＃160;＆＃215 ;＆＃160; 10 3 ＆＃160; nm＆＃160; V ＆＃8722; 2 ，转换效率为0.0007％。我们还表明，可以利用上转换的三次谐波发射来探测等离子体二聚体间隙处的近场强度。

title: Three-dimensional manipulation with scanning near-field optical nanotweezers
title_cn: 扫描近场光学纳米镊子的三维操纵
abstract: Recent advances in nanotechnologies have prompted the need for tools to accurately and non-invasively manipulate individual nano-objects. Among the possible strategies, optical forces have been predicted to provide researchers with nano-optical tweezers capable of trapping a specimen and moving it in three dimensions. In practice, however, the combination of weak optical forces and photothermal issues has thus far prevented their experimental realization. Here, we demonstrate the first three-dimensional optical manipulation of single 50 nm dielectric objects with near-field nanotweezers. The nano-optical trap is built by engineering a bowtie plasmonic aperture at the extremity of a tapered metal-coated optical fibre. Both the trapping operation and monitoring are performed through the optical fibre, making these nanotweezers totally autonomous and free of bulky optical elements. The achieved trapping performances allow for the trapped specimen to be moved over tens of micrometres over a period of several minutes with very low in-trap intensities. This non-invasive approach is foreseen to open new horizons in nanosciences by offering an unprecedented level of control of nanosized objects, including heat-sensitive biospecimens.
abstract_cn: 纳米技术的最新发展促使人们需要精确而无创地操纵单个纳米物体的工具。在可能的策略中，据预测，光学力会为研究人员提供纳米光学镊子，该镊子能够捕获标本并在三个维度上移动标本。然而，实际上，迄今为止，弱光学力和光热问题的结合阻止了它们的实验实现。在这里，我们演示了使用近场纳米镊子对单个50nm介电物体进行的第一个三维光学操作。纳米光学陷阱是通过在锥形金属涂层光纤的末端设计蝶形等离激元孔径而构建的。捕获操作和监视都通过光纤进行，从而使这些纳米镊子完全自治，并且没有笨重的光学元件。达到的捕集性能允许被捕集的标本在几分钟内以非常低的捕集强度移动超过几十微米。通过提供前所未有的对包括热敏生物标本在内的纳米物体的控制水平，可以预见这种非侵入性方法将为纳米科学开辟新的视野。

title: Engineering bright sub-10-nm upconverting nanocrystals for single-molecule imaging
title_cn: 工程亮的亚10纳米以下上转换纳米晶体用于单分子成像
abstract: Imaging at the single-molecule level reveals heterogeneities that are lost in ensemble imaging experiments, but an ongoing challenge is the development of luminescent probes with the photostability, brightness and continuous emission necessary for single-molecule microscopy. Lanthanide-doped upconverting nanoparticles overcome problems of photostability and continuous emission and their upconverted emission can be excited with near-infrared light at powers orders of magnitude lower than those required for conventional multiphoton probes. However, the brightness of upconverting nanoparticles has been limited by open questions about energy transfer and relaxation within individual nanocrystals and unavoidable tradeoffs between brightness and size. Here, we develop upconverting nanoparticles under 10 nm in diameter that are over an order of magnitude brighter under single-particle imaging conditions than existing compositions, allowing us to visualize single upconverting nanoparticles as small (d = 4.8 nm) as fluorescent proteins. We use advanced single-particle characterization and theoretical modelling to find that surface effects become critical at diameters under 20 nm and that the fluences used in single-molecule imaging change the dominant determinants of nanocrystal brightness. These results demonstrate that factors known to increase brightness in bulk experiments lose importance at higher excitation powers and that, paradoxically, the brightest probes under single-molecule excitation are barely luminescent at the ensemble level.
abstract_cn: 在单分子水平成像揭示了在集成成像实验中丢失的异质性，但是一个持续的挑战是开发发光探针，该探针具有单分子显微镜所必需的光稳定性，亮度和连续发射性。掺杂镧系元素的上转换纳米粒子克服了光稳定性和连续发射的问题，并且它们的上转换发射可以用近红外光以比常规多光子探针所需的功率低几个数量级的功率来激发。但是，上转换纳米颗粒的亮度受到有关单个纳米晶体中能量转移和弛豫以及亮度和尺寸之间不可避免的折衷的悬而未决的问题的限制。在这里，我们开发了直径小于10纳米的上转换纳米粒子，该粒子在单粒子成像条件下比现有组合物的亮度要高一个数量级，从而使我们可以观察到小到单个上转换的纳米粒子（d＆＃160; =＆＃160 ; 4.8＆＃160; nm）作为荧光蛋白。我们使用高级的单颗粒表征和理论模型来发现，在直径小于20 nm时，表面效应变得至关重要，并且单分子成像中使用的注量改变了纳米晶体亮度的主要决定因素。这些结果表明，在大量实验中已知增加亮度的因素在更高的激发功率下失去了重要性，而且自相矛盾的是，单分子激发下最亮的探针在整体水平上几乎不发光。

title: All-water-based electron-beam lithography using silk as a resist
title_cn: 使用丝绸作为抗蚀剂的全水基电子束光刻
abstract: Traditional nanofabrication techniques often require complex lithographic steps and the use of toxic chemicals. To move from the laboratory scale to large scales, nanofabrication should be carried out using alternative procedures that are simple, inexpensive and use non-toxic solvents. Recent efforts have focused on nanoimprinting and the use of organic resists (such as quantum dot–polymer hybrids, DNA and poly(ethylene glycol)), which still require, for the most part, noxious chemicals for processing. Significant advances have been achieved using ‘green’ resists that can be developed with water, but so far these approaches have suffered from low electron sensitivity, line edge roughness and scalability constraints. Here, we present the use of silk as a natural and biofunctional resist for electron-beam lithography. The process is entirely water-based, starting with the silk aqueous solution and ending with simple development of the exposed silk film in water. Because of its polymorphic crystalline structure, silk can be used either as a positive or negative resist through interactions with an electron beam. Moreover, silk can be easily modified, thereby enabling a variety of ‘functional resists’, including biologically active versions. As a proof of principle of the viability of all-water-based silk electron-beam lithography (EBL), we fabricate nanoscale photonic lattices using both neat silk and silk doped with quantum dots, green fluorescent proteins (GFPs) or horseradish peroxidase (HRP).
abstract_cn: 传统的纳米制造技术通常需要复杂的光刻步骤和使用有毒化学物质。为了从实验室规模扩大到大规模，应使用简单，廉价且使用无毒溶剂的替代方法进行纳米加工。最近的工作集中在纳米压印和有机抗蚀剂（例如量子点聚合物杂合物，DNA和聚乙二醇）的使用上，而这些抗蚀剂在很大程度上仍需要进行处理。使用＆＃8216; green＆＃8217;已取得了重大进展。可以用水显影的抗蚀剂，但到目前为止，这些方法都受到电子灵敏度低，线边缘粗糙度和可扩展性限制的困扰。在这里，我们介绍了丝绸作为电子束光刻的天然和生物功能抗蚀剂的用途。该过程完全基于水，从丝绸水溶液开始，到暴露的丝绸薄膜在水中简单显影结束。由于其多晶型的晶体结构，丝可以通过与电子束的相互作用用作正或负抗蚀剂。而且，可以轻松地对丝绸进行修饰，从而实现各种功能性抗蚀剂，包括生物活性版本。为了证明全水基丝绸电子束光刻（EBL）的可行性，我们使用纯净的丝绸和掺有量子点，绿色荧光蛋白（GFP）或辣根过氧化物酶（HRP）的丝绸制造了纳米级光子晶格）。</ p>

title: Biogenic gas nanostructures as ultrasonic molecular reporters
title_cn: 生物气体纳米结构作为超声分子报道分子
abstract: Ultrasound is among the most widely used non-invasive imaging modalities in biomedicine, but plays a surprisingly small role in molecular imaging due to a lack of suitable molecular reporters on the nanoscale. Here, we introduce a new class of reporters for ultrasound based on genetically encoded gas nanostructures from microorganisms, including bacteria and archaea. Gas vesicles are gas-filled protein-shelled compartments with typical widths of 45–250 nm and lengths of 100–600 nm that exclude water and are permeable to gas. We show that gas vesicles produce stable ultrasound contrast that is readily detected in vitro and in vivo, that their genetically encoded physical properties enable multiple modes of imaging, and that contrast enhancement through aggregation permits their use as molecular biosensors.
abstract_cn: 超声是生物医学中使用最广泛的非侵入性成像方式之一，但由于缺乏合适的纳米分子报告分子，因此在分子成像中起着令人惊讶的小作用。 在这里，我们介绍了一种新的超声波报告器，它基于微生物（包括细菌和古细菌）的遗传编码气体纳米结构。 气体囊泡是充满蛋白质的带壳小室，其典型宽度为45到250纳米，长度为100到600纳米，不包括水，并且可以透过气体。 我们证明，气体囊泡可产生稳定的超声对比度，该超声对比度在体外和体内均可轻易检测到，它们的遗传编码物理特性可实现多种成像模式，并且通过聚集增强的对比度可将其用作分子生物传感器。</ p>

title: Nanofluidic transport governed by the liquid/vapour interface
title_cn: 纳米流体的传输受液体/蒸气界面的控制
abstract: Liquid/vapour interfaces govern the behaviour of a wide range of systems but remain poorly understood, leaving ample margin for the exploitation of intriguing functionalities for applications. Here, we systematically investigate the role of liquid/vapour interfaces in the transport of water across apposing liquid menisci in osmosis membranes comprising short hydrophobic nanopores that separate two fluid reservoirs. We show experimentally that mass transport is limited by molecular reflection from the liquid/vapour interface below a certain length scale, which depends on the transmission probability of water molecules across the nanopores and on the condensation probability of a water molecule incident on the liquid surface. This fundamental yet elusive condensation property of water is measured under near-equilibrium conditions and found to decrease from 0.36 ± 0.21 at 30 °C to 0.18 ± 0.09 at 60 °C. These findings define the regime in which liquid/vapour interfaces govern nanofluidic transport and have implications for understanding mass transport in nanofluidic devices, droplets and bubbles, biological components and porous media involving liquid/vapour interfaces.
abstract_cn: 液体/蒸气界面控制着各种系统的行为，但人们对其了解甚少，为应用程序吸引人的功能留有足够的余地。在这里，我们系统地研究了液体/蒸气界面在水穿过跨膜液体半月板的渗透过程中所起的作用，该膜包括将两个流体储层分开的短疏水纳米孔。我们从实验上表明，传质受到液体/蒸气界面在一定长度尺度以下的分子反射的限制，这取决于水分子穿过纳米孔的传输概率以及入射在液体表面的水分子的冷凝概率。在接近平衡的条件下测量水的这种基本但难以捉摸的冷凝性能，发现其在30℃时从0.36降至0.21降至0.18。在60℃时为0.09。这些发现确定了液/蒸气界面控制纳米流体传输的方式，并且对理解纳米流体装置中的质量传输，液滴和气泡，生物成分以及涉及液/蒸气界面的多孔介质具有重要意义。
